meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-201-185510-351190_0310.10 ::date 2015-10-04T11:54:00 ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred # ::snt The difference between John and some others is that John is a "knower", not a "believer". # ::save-date Sun Dec 31, 2017 ::file bolt-eng-DF-201-185510-351190_0310_10.txt
sentence: The difference between John and some others is that John is a "knower", not a "believer".

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-201-185510-351190_0310.11 ::date 2015-10-04T11:56:33 ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred # ::snt You can "believe" all the evidence (whether it is scientific or not) that you want, but until you have your own sighting, you can never be a "knower". # ::save-date Thu Oct 15, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-201-185510-351190_0310_11.txt
sentence: You can "believe" all the evidence (whether it is scientific or not) that you want, but until you have your own sighting, you can never be a "knower".
